panels.description:
Alert history for _**$ic**_.

* *green* - not firing
* *yellow* - firing, `severity="info"`
* *orange* - firing, `severity="ticket"`
* *red* - firing, `severity="page"`

targets.expr:
label_replace(
label_replace(
label_replace(
label_replace(
label_replace(
label_replace(
sum without (severity, alertstate) (
  max_over_time(ALERTS{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance",alertstate="firing",severity="page"}[$__interval]) * 3
    or on (job, ic, alertname, alertstate)
  max_over_time(ALERTS{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance",alertstate="firing",severity="ticket"}[$__interval]) * 2
    or on (job, ic, alertname, alertstate)
  max_over_time(ALERTS{ic="$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",instance=~"$instance",alertstate="firing",severity="info"}[$__interval]) * 1
),
"__name__", "$1 ", "alertname", "(.*)"),
"alertname", "", "alertname", ".*"),
"ic", "", "ic", ".*"),
"ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([a-z0-9]+)-.*"),
"ic_node", "$1", "ic_node", "([a-z0-9]+)-.*"),
"instance", "$1...$2", "instance", "(\\[[^.:]+[.:]).*([.:][^.:]+\\]?:[0-9]+)")

panels.title: IC Alerts

targets.expr:
max_over_time(process_start_time_seconds{job="replica", instance=~"$instance", ic="$ic"}[5m])
!= bool
  max_over_time(process_start_time_seconds{job="replica", instance=~"$instance", ic="$ic"}[5m] offset $__interval)

panels.description: $http_request_type HTTP request duration distribution across selected subnets, aggregated over **$period** (configurable).
panels.title: $http_request_type Request Durations, Aggregated

panels.description:
State Manager API operation duration distribution across selected instances, aggregated over **$period** (configurable).

The purple overlay shows the time share (proportion of time spent in `$state_manager_api_op`).
panels.title: State Manager API `$state_manager_api_op` Duration

panels.description:
State Manager checkpoint operation duration distribution across selected instances, aggregated over **$period** (configurable).

The purple overlay shows the time share (proportion of time spent in `$state_manager_api_op`).
panels.title: State Manager Checkpoint  `$state_manager_checkpoint_op` Duration

panels.description:
Consensus validation duration distribution by artifact type across selected instances, aggregated over **$period** (configurable).

The purple overlay shows the time share (proportion of time spent validating `$consensus_validation_type`).
panels.title: Consensus Validation  `$consensus_validation_type` Duration
